snippet.title: Cyber Knights: Flashpoint - Updated trailer! Demo live for Steam Next Fest!
snippet.description:
On June 19th we’ll have a free demo featured in Steam Next Fest! Do you have Cyber Knights wishlisted ( http://s.team/a/1021210/ )? A new launch trailer is coming later this year, but check out this current trailer update, including more of the latest development progress. Cyber Knights is a tactical RPG in an original cyberpunk setting ten years in the making. Build your team of hackers, mercs and malcontents wisely; their stories will become interwoven with your own. Use powerful cyberware, shady connections, stealth, hacking and more to rise in the neon-soaked future.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1021210/Cyber_Knights_Flashpoint/
Follow for updates & previews: https://twitter.com/CyberKnightsRPG
Join our community: https://discord.gg/TreseBrothers

Coming to Steam (Windows, Mac, Linux) and then to mobile (Android, iOS).
